Namo Arihantanam,
Namo Siddanam,
Namo Aayariyanam,
Namo Uvajjhayanam,
Namo Loe Savva-sahunam,
Eso Panch Namokkaro,
Savva-pava ppanasano 
Manglanam cha savvesim
PadhamamHavai Mangalam.

(3 baar Saviddhi bole) Tikkhuto, Ayahinam,
 Payahinam, Karemi,
 Vandami, Namamsami,
 Sakkaremi, Sammanemi,
 Kallanam, Mangalam,
 Devyam, Cheiyam,
 Pajjuvasami,
 Mathhen Vandami.

Ichchha- Karenam Sandisaha Bhagavan! Iriyavahiyam Paddikkamami Ichchham Ichchami Padikkamium! Iriyavahiyae Virahanae, Gamanagamane, Panakkamane, Biyakkamane, Hariyakkamane, Osa, Uttinga, Panaga, Daga, Matti, Makkada, Santana, Sankamane, Je me jivavirahiya, Egindiya, Beindiya, Teindiya, Chaurindiya, Panchindiya Abihaya, Vattiya, Lesiya, Sanghaiya, Sanghattiya, Pariyaviya, Kilamiya, Uddaviya, Thanao-Thanam, Sankamiya Jiviyao- Vavaroviya, Tassa Micchhami Dukkadam.

Tassauttarikaranenam payacchitta- karanenam, visohi- karanenam, visalli- karanenam Pavanam, kammanam, Nigghayanatthae Thami Kaussaggam. Annattha Usasienam, Neesasienam, Khasienam, Chienam, Jambhaienam, Udduenam, Vay- nisaggenam, Bhamalie, Pitta- muchhae, Suhumehim Anga- sanchalehim, Suhumehim Khel- sanchalehim, Suhumehim Ditthi- sanchalehim, Evamaiehim, Agarehim, Abhaggo, Avirahio, Hujja Me Kaussaggo Java Arihantanam, Bhagavantanam, Namokkarenam, NaParemi TavaKayam Thanenam, Monenam, Jhanenam, Appanam Vosirami.

Logassa Ujjoya- gare Dhamma- Tittha- Yare jine,
 Arihante Kittaissam Chauvisampi Kevali (1) 

 Usabhamajiyam Cha Vande, Sambhavamabhinandanam Cha
 Sumaim Cha Paumappaham Supasam Jinam Cha Chandappaham Vande (2)

 Suvihim Cha Puffhadantam Siyal Sijjansa Vasu- pujjamCha
 Vimalmanantam Cha Jinam, Dhammam Santim Cha Vandami (3)

 Kunthum Aram Cha Mallim Vande Muni- suvvayamNami- jinam Cha.
 VandamiRittha- nemim Pasamtah Vaddhamanam Cha (4)

 Evam Mae Abhithua, Vihuyarayamala Pahinjarmarana
 ChauVisam Pi jinavara, Titthayara Me Pasiyantu (5)

 Kittiya- vandiy- mahiya, Je ea Logassa Uttama Siddha.
 Arugga- Bohi- labham, Samahi- Vara- Muttamam- dintu (6)

 Chandesu Nimmalayara Aichhesu Ahiyam Payasayara.
 Sagarvargambhira Siddha Siddhim Mam Disantu (7)
Karemi Bhante ! Samaiyam, Savajjam Jogam Pachhakkhami Jav Niyamam Pajjuvasami, Duviham Tivihenam Na Karemi, Na Karvemi Mansa, Vaysa, Kaysa Tass Bhante! Pdikkamami Nindami Garihami Appanam Vosirami.

Namotthunam Arihantanam, Bhagavantanam, Aaigaranam, Titthayaranam, SayamSambuddhanam, Purisuttamanam, Purisasihanam, Purisavar Pundarianam, Purisavar Gandhahatthinam, Loguttamanam, Loganahanam, Logahiyanam, Logapaivanam, Lohpajjoyagaranam, Abhaydayanam, Chakkudayanam, Maggadayanam, Sarandayanam, Jeevdayanam, Bohidayanam, Dhammadayanam, Dhammadesayanam, Dhammnayaganam, Dhammsarahinam, Dhammavarchauranta Chakkavattinam, Divottanam, Sarangaipaitthanam Appadihayavaranana Dansana Dharanam, Viyatta chaumanam, Jinanam Javayanam, Tinnanam Taryanam, Buddhanam Bohayanam, Muttanam Moyganam Savvannunam Savvadarisinam SivamayalmaruaManantaMakkhay MavvabahMapunaravitti, SiddhigaiNamadheyam, ThanamSampattanam, Namo Jinanam Jiy bhayanam.

(2re mai)

Thanam Sampaviukamanam,Namo Jinanam Jiy-bhayanam. Namotthunam 
 (3re mai )

Namotthunam mam dhammayariyass dhammovdesyassa Aneggunsanjuttass java sampaviu kamass.

Eyassa Navamassa Samaiya Vayassa Pancha Aiyara Janiyavva Na Samayariyavva Tamjaha Te Alou- Manaduppanihane, Vayaduppanihane, Kayaduppanihane, Samaiyassa Sai Akaranayae, Samaiyassa AnavatthiyassaKaranyae Tass Michhami Dukkadam.

 Samaiyam Sammam Kayenam Na Phasiyam, Na Paliyam, Na Sohiyam, Na Teeriyam, Na Kittiyam, Na Arahiyam, Anaye Anupaliyam Na Bhavai Tass Micchami Dukkadam.

 Paddikkamami Aaharasanna, Bhayasanna, Mehunasanna, PariggahaSanna aeya chu Sanna kaya Tass Micchami Dukkadam.

 Paddikkamami chaunham Vikaha Ithikaha/ puriskaha, bhattkaha, Deskaha, raykaha aeya chu Vikaha kaya Tass Micchami Dukkadam.

 Aekkamane Vaekkamane Aeyaare Anayaare jo mein devsio aeyaaro kao Tass Micchami Dukkadam.

 Samaea Manso Das Dosa Vayanassa Das Dosa, Sarirassa Duvalassa Dosa kaya Tass Micchami Dukkadam.
Dhyan mai man, vachan, kaaya chalet hua ho, Aartdhyan, Raudradhyan dhyaya ho Dharma Dhyan Shukla Dhyan nahi dhyaya ho, to Tassa Micchhami Dukkadam.
Arihanto Mahadevo, Javajjivam Susahuno Guruno Jinapanattam Tattam, ea Sammatam maye Gahiyam.

Panchendiy Savarno taha navaviha Bambhacher Guttidharo
Chuvih Kasaymukko, ea Attharas Gunehim Sanjutto
 Panch Mahavvaya Jutto, Panch Vihayar Palan Samttho
 Panch Samie Tigutto, Chattis Guno Guru Majjha
Shree Mahaveer Swami, Simandhar Swami, Guruguruniji m. s. aapase Chauvisathav karne ki aadnyaa leta / leti hu.
Shree Mahaveer Swami, Simandhar Swami, Guruguruniji m. s. aapase devasi/ raysi pratikraman karne ki aadnyaa leta / leti hu.
Ichhaminam Bhante! Tubbhehim Abbanunnaye Samane Devasiyam Padikkamanam Thayemi Devasiya-Nana-Dansana Charittacharitta Tav Aiyar-Chintanatham Karemi Kaussaggam.
( Khade hokar) Shree Mahaveer Swami, Simandhar Swami, Guruguruniji m.s. aapase Pratham Avashyak ki aadnyaa leta/leti hu

Ichhami Thami Kaussaggam Jo Me Devasio Aaiyaro Kao, Kaio, Vaio, Manasio, Ussutto, Ummaggo, Akappo, Akarnijjo, Dujjhao, Duvvichintio, Anayaro, Anichhiyavvo, Asavag Pauggo, Nane Tah Dansane, Charittacharitte, Sue, Samaiye, Tinham Guttinam, Chaunham Kasayanam, Panchanham Anuvayanam Tinham Gunvayanam, Chaunham Sikkhavayanam, Baras Vihass Savag Dhammass Jam Khandiyam, Jam Virahiyam, Tass Michhami Dukkadam.
( \'Appanam Osrami \'kehte hi Kayotsarg Mudra mai baithe. )( Kayotsarg mai micchami dukkadam na bole )

Agame Tivihe Pannatte Tamjaha Suttagame, Atthagame, Tadubhayagame, Is Tarah Teen Prakar Ke Agamrup Gyan Ke Vishay Me Jo Koi Atichar Laga Ho To Aloum, Jam Vaiddham, Vachhameliyam, Heenakkharam, Achhakkharam, Payheenam, Vinayheenam, Jogheenam, Ghosaheenam, Sutthudinnam, Dutthupadichhiyam, Akale Kao Sajjhao, Kale Na Kao Sajjhao, Asajjhaye Sajjhaiyam, Sajjhaye Na Sajjhaiyam, Bhanta, Gunta, Vicharta, Gyan Aur Gyanvant Purusho Ki Avinay Ashatna Ki Ho To Jo Me Devasio Aiyaro Kao Tass Michhami Dukkadam.

Agame Tivihe Pannatte Tamjaha Suttagame, Atthagame, Tadubhayagame, Is Tarah Teen Prakar Ke Agamrup Gyan Ke Vishay Me Jo Koi Atichar Laga Ho To Aloum, Jam Vaiddham, Vachhameliyam, Heenakkharam, Achhakkharam, Payheenam, Vinayheenam, Jogheenam, Ghosaheenam, Sutthudinnam, Dutthupadichhiyam, Akale Kao Sajjhao, Kale Na Kao Sajjhao, Asajjhaye Sajjhaiyam, Sajjhaye Na Sajjhaiyam, Bhanta, Gunta, Vicharta, Gyan Aur Gyanvant Purusho Ki Avinay Ashatna Ki Ho.

Arihanto Mah Devo, Javjjivam Susahuno Guruno
 Jinapannattam Tattam, Ea Sammattam Maye Gahiyam ।।1।।
 Parmatth Santhavo Va, Sudittha Parmattha Sevana Va Vi ।
 Vavanna Kudansana Vajjana, Ya Sammatta Saddahana ।।2।।
 Ea Sammattassa Panch Aiyara Peyala Janiyavva Na Samayariyavva Tamjaha Te Aloum-Sanka, Kankha, Vitigichha, Parpasand Pasansa, Parpasand Santhavo-Is Prakar Shri Samkit Ratna Padarth Ke Vishay Me Jo Koi Atichar Laga Ho To Aloum-
 1. Shri Jin Vachan Saccha kar, shraddha na ho, Prateetya na ho 
 2. Pardarshan Ki Akanksha Ki Ho 
 3 . Par-pakhandi Ki Prashansa Ki Ho 
 4. Par-pakhandi Ka Parichay Kiya Ho, 
 5. Dharm Ke Phal Me Sandeh Kiya Ho, Mere Samyaktva Roop Ratna Par Mithyatva Roopi Raj Mail Laga Ho.

Pranatipat Virman Vrat Ke Vishay Me Jo Koi Atichar Laga Ho To Aloum - 
 1. Rosh Vash Gadha Bandhan Bandha Ho, 
 2. Gadha Ghav Ghala Ho,
3. Avyav Ka Chedan Kiya Ho, 
4. Adhik Bhar Bhara Ho, 
5. Bhat Pani Ka Vichhed Kiya Ho.

Mrushawad Virman Vrat Ke Vishay Me Jo Koi Atichar Laga Ho To Aloum - 
1. Sahsakar Se Kisi Ke Prati Kuda Aal Diya Ho, 
2. Ekant Me Gupt Batchit Karte Hue Vyaktio Par Jhutha Arop Lagaya Ho, 
3. Stri Purush Ka Marm Prakashit Kiya Ho,
4. Mrusha Updesh Diya Ho,
5. Kuda Lekh Likha Ho.

Adattadan Virman Vrat Ke Vishay Me Jo Koi Atichar Laga Ho To Aloum - 
1. Chor Ki Churai Hui Vastu Li Ho,
2. Chor Ko Sahayta Di Ho, 
3. Rajya Viruddh Kam Kiya Ho,
4. Kuda Tol Kuda Map Kiya Ho,
5. Vastu Me Bhel Sambhel Kiya Ho.

Swadar-Santosh Pardar Vivarjan (Swapati Santosh Parpurush Vivarjan) Roop Maithun Virman Vrat Ke Vishay Me Jo Koi Atichar Laga Ho To Aloum –
1. Ittariya Pariggahiya Se Gaman Kiya Ho,
2. Apariggahiya Se Gaman Kiya Ho,
 3. Anang Kreeda Ki Ho,
4. Paraye Ka Vivah Nata Karaya Ho,
5. Kam Bhog Ki Tivra Abhilasha Ki Ho.

Parigrah Pariman Vrat Ke Vishay Me Jo Koi Atichar Laga Ho To Aloum -
 1. Khett Vatthu Ke Pariman Ka Atikraman Kiya Ho,
2. Hiranya Suvarna Ke Pariman Ka Atikraman Kiya Ho,
3. Dhan-Dhanya Ke Pariman Ka Atikraman Kiya Ho, 
4. Dwipad Chaupad Ke Pariman Ka Atikraman Kiya Ho,
5. Kuviy Sona Chandi Adi Dhatu Ke Pariman Ka Atikraman Kiya Ho.

Ke Vishay Me Jo Koi Atichar Laga Ho To Aloum -
1. Unchi Disha Ka Pariman Atikraman Kiya Ho,
2. Nichi Disha Ka Pariman Atikraman Kiya Ho, 
3. Tirchi Disha Ka Pariman Atikraman Kiya Ho, 
4. Kshetra Badhaya Ho,
5. Kshetra Ka Pariman Bhool Jane Se Pantha Ka Sandeh Padne Par Age Chala Ho.

Ke Vishay Me Jo Koi Atichar Laga Ho To Aloum - 
1. Pachhakkan Uprant Sachitt Ka Ahar Kiya Ho,
2. Sachitt PadibaddhKa Ahar Kiya Ho, 
3. Apakva Ka Ahar Kiya Ho,
4. Dupakva Ka Ahar Kiya Ho,
5. Tuchhoushadhi Ka Ahar Kiya Ho.

Jo Shravak Shravika Ko Janane Yogya Hai Kintu Acharan Karne Yogya Nahi Hai Unme Jo Koi Atichar Laga Ho To Aloum -
1. Ingalkamme 
2. Vanakamme 
3. Sadikamme 
4. Bhadikamme 
5. Phodikamme
6. Dantvanijje
7. Lakkhavanijje 
8. Rasvanijje
9. Kesvanijje
10. Visavanijje
11. Jantpilankamme
12. Nilanchanakamme 
13. Davaggidavaniya
14. Sar-Dah-Talay-Sosanya
15. Asaijanposnaya.

Ke Vishay Me Jo Koi Atichar Laga Ho To Aloum -
1. Kam Vikar Paida Karne Wali Katha Ki Ho, 
2. Bhand Kuchesta Ki Ho,
3. Mukhari Vachan Bola Ho,
4. Adhikaran Jod Rakkha Ho,
5. Upbhog Paribhog Adhik Bhadhaya Ho.

Ke Vishay Me Jo Koi Atichar Laga Ho To Aloum -
1. Man Vachan Kaya Ke Ashubh Yog Pravartaye Ho,
2. Samayik Ki Smruti Na Ki Ho, 
3. Samay Purna Hue Bina Samayik Pari Ho.

Ke Vishay Me Jo Koi Atichar Laga Ho To Aloum -
1. Niyamit Seema Ke Bahar Ki Vastu Mangvai Ho,
2. Bijvai Ho, 
3. Shabd Karke Chetaya Ho,
4. Roop Dikhakar Apne Bhav Prakat Kiya Ho,
5. Kankar Adi Phenk Kar Dusron Ko Bulaya Ho.

Ke Vishy Me Jo Koi Atichar Laga Ho To Aloum -
1. Paushadh Me Shayya Santhara Na Dekha Ho Ya Achi Tarah Se Na Dekha Ho, 
2. Pramarjan Na Kiya Ho Ya Achhi Tarah Se Na kiya Ho, 
3. Uchhar Pasvan Ki Bhoomi Ko Na Dekhi Ho Ya Achhi Tarah Se Na Dekhi Ho, 
4. Punji Na Ho Ya Achhi Tarah Se Na Punji Ho, 
5. Upwas Yukta Paushadh Ka Samyak Prakar Se Palan Na Kiya Ho.

Ke Vishay Me Jo Koi Atichar Laga Ho To Aloum - 
1. Sujati Vastu Sachitt Me Dali Ho,
2. Sachitt Se Dhanki Ho, 
3. Apni Vastu Parai Kahi Ho,
4. Matsar Bhav Se Dan Diya Ho, 
5. Bhojan Ka Samay Talkar Sadhuon Se Prarthana Ki Ho Athava Dan Dene Ki Bhavana N Bhai Ho.

Sanlekhana Ke Vishay Me Jo Koi Atichar Laga Ho To Aloum - 
1. Is lok mai Raja Chakrawarti aadi ke sukh ki wancha ki ho . 
2. Parlok mai Devta Indra aadi ke sukh ki wancha ki ho. 
3. jivit rahne ki akanksha ki ho. 
4. Marne ki iccha ki ho. 
5. Bhogvilas ki abhilasha ki ho.
 'Ma majz, hujj marnente vi saddhaparuwannami annaha Bhawo' - Arthathat marnantik kasht honepar bhi meri shradha prarupana mai farak naho .

1. Pranatipat, 2. Mrushawad, 3. Adattadan, 4. Maithun, 5. Parigrah, 6. Krodh, 7. Maan, 8. Maya, 9. Lobh, 10. Rag, 11. Dwesh, 12. Kalah, 13. Abhyakhyan, 14. Paishunya, 15. Parpariwad, 16. Rati-Arati, 17. Maya-mrushawad, 18. Mithyadarshan shalya
 In Attharah Papsthano Me Se Kisi Ka Sevan Kiya Ho, Karaya Ho, Karte Hue ka anumodan kiya ho.

Ichhami Thami Kaussaggam Jo Me Devasio Aaiyaro Kao, Kaio, Vaio, Manasio, Ussutto, Ummaggo, Akappo, Akarnijjo, Dujjhao, Duvvichintio, Anayaro, Anichhiyavvo, Asavag Pauggo, Nane Tah Dansane, Charittacharitte, Sue, Samaiye, Tinham Guttinam, Chaunham Kasayanam, Panchanham Anuvayanam Tinham Gunvayanam, Chaunham Sikkhavayanam, Baras Vihass Savag Dhammass Jam Khandiyam, Jam Virahiyam
Shree Mahaveer Swami, Simandhar Swami evam Guruguruniji m. s. Pahila Avashyak purna huva Aapase Dusare Aavashyak karne ki aadnyaa leta / leti hu.
Pehla Samayik, Dusara Chauvisattva ye do Avashyak purna huye Shree Mahaveer Swami, Simandhar Swami evam Guruguruniji m. s. aapase teesare Avashyak karaneki aadnyaa leta/leti hu.

Ichhami Khamasamno! Vandium Javnijjaye Niseehiyae Anujanah Me Miuggaham Niseehi. Aho Kayam Kay Samfasam Khamnijjo Bhe! Kilamo Appakilantanam Bahu Subhenam Bhe!Divaso Vaikkanto Jatta Bhe! Javani Jjamcha Bhe! Khamemi Khamasamno! Devasiyam Vaikkamam, Avassiyae, Padikkamami, Khamasamnanam, Devasiae, Asayanae, Tittisannyarae, Jam Kinchi Michhae, Mandukkadae, Vaydukkadae, Kaydukkadae, Kohae, Manae, Mayae, Lohae, Savvakaliyae, Savvamichhovayarae, Savvadhammaikkamnae, Asayanae, Jo Me Devasio Aiyaro Kao Tass Khamasamno! Padikkamami, Nindami, Garihami, Appanam Vosirami.
Pahla Samayik, Dusara Chauvisattva teesare Vandana ye teen Avashya purna huye, Shree Mahaveer Swami, Simandhar Swami evam Guruguruniji m. s. aapase Chauthe Aavashyak kee aadnyaa leta/leti hu .

Dansansamatta Parmatth Santhavo Va, Sudittha Parmattha Sevana Va Vi ।
 Vavanna Kudansana Vajjana, Ya Sammatta Saddahana ।।
 Evam samanovasenam Sammattassa Panch Aiyara Peyala Janiyavva Na Samayariyavva Tamjaha Te Aloum - Sanka, Kankha, Vitigichha, Parpasandi Pasansa, Parpasandi Santhavo , Evam paanch aticharo me jo koi atichar laga ho to Tass Michhami Dukkadam.

Thulao Panaivayao Vermanam Tras Jeev Beindriya, Teindriya, Chaurindriya, Panchindriya, Jan Ke, Pahichan Ke Sankalp Karke Usme Sage-Sambhandhi Va Sva Sharir Ke Bhitar Me Pidakari Saparadhi Ko Chod Niraparadhi Ko Akutti Ki Buddhi Se Hanane Ka Pachhakkhan Javajjivaye Duviham, Tivihenam, Na Karemi, Na Karvemi, Mansa, Vaysa Kaysa Aise Pahla Sthool Pranatipat Virman Vrat Ke Panch Aiyara Peyala Janiyavva Na Samayariyavva Tamjaha Te Aloum-Bandhe, Vahe, Chavichhe-a, Aibhare, Bhattapanvichhe-a, Jo Me Devasio Aiyaro Kao Tass Michhami Dukkadam.

Thulao Musavayao Vermanam-Kannaliye, Govaliye, Bhomaliye, Nnasavaharo, Kudsakkhijje Ityadi Mota Jhut Bolne Ka Pachhakkhan. Javajjivaye Duviham Tivihenam Na Karemi, Na Karvemi, Mansa, Vaysa, kaysa Evam Duja Sthool Mrushawad Virman Vrat Ke Panch Aiyara Janiyavva Na Samayariyavva Tamjaha Te Aloum-Sahassabbakkhane, Rahassabbakkhane, Sadarmantabheye, Mosovayese, Kudleh Karne, Jo Me Devasio Aiyaro Kao Tass Michhami Dukkadam.

Thulao Adinnasanao Vermanam Khat Khan Kar Ganth Khol Kar Tale Par Kunchi Lagakar, Marg Me Chalte Hue Ko Lootkar, Padi Hui Dhaniyati Moti Vastu Jankar Lena, Ityadi Mota Adattadan Ka Pachhakkhan Sage Sambandhi, Vyapar Sambandhi, Tatha Padi Nirbhrami Vastu Ke Uprant Adattadan Ka Pachhakkhan Javajjivaye Duviham, Tivihenam, Na Karemi, Na Karvemi, Mansa, Vaysa, Kaysa Evam Teeja Sthool Adattadan Virman Vrat Ke Panch Aiyara Janiyavva Na Samayariyavva Tamjaha Te Aloum-Tenahade, Takkarappaoge, Virudharajjaikkame, Kudtull Kudmane, Tappadi Ruvag Vavahare, Jo Me Devasio Aiyaro Kao Tass Michhami Dukkadam.

Thulao Mehunao Vermanam-Sadarsantosiye Avases Mehunvihim Pachhakkami Javajjivaye Dev-Devi Sambandhi Duviham, Tivihenam, Na Karemi, Na Karvemi, Mansa, Vaysa, Kaysa Tatha Manushya-Tiryanch Sambandhi Egviham, Egvihenam, Na Karemi, Kaysa Evam Chautha Sthool Swadar Santosh Pardar Vivarjan Roop Maithun Virman Vrat Ke Panch Aiyara Janiyavva Na Samayariyavva Tamjaha Te Aloum-Ittariya Pariggahiya Gamne, Apariggahiya Gamne, Anangakeeda, Pravivah Karne, Kam Bhogativvabhilase, Jo Me Devasio Aiyaro Kao Tass Michhami Dukkadam.

Thulao Pariggahao Vermanam-Khett-Vatthu Ka Yatha Pariman, Hiranna-Suvanna Ka Yatha Pariman, Dhan-Dhanya Ka Yatha Pariman, Dwipad-Chatushpad Ka Yatha Pariman, Kuviy Dhatu Ka Yatha Pariman, Evam Jo Pariman Kiya Hai Uske Uprant Apna Karke Parigraha Rakhne Ka Pachhakhan Javajjivaye Egviham, Tivihenam, Na Karemi, Mansa, Vaysa, Kaysa Evam Panchva Sthool Parigrah Pariman Vrat Ke Panch Aiyara Janiyavva Na Samayariyavva Tamjaha Te Aloum-Khett-Vatthuppamanaikkame, Hiranna-Suvannappamanaikkame, Dhandhannappamanaikkame, Duppaya-Chauppayappamanaikkame, Kuviyappamanaikkame, Jo Me Devasio Aiyaro Kao Tass Michhami Dukkadam.

Uddhadisi Ka Yatha Pariman Ahodisi Ka Yatha Pariman Tiriyadisi Ka Yatha Pariman Evam Jo Pariman Kiya Hai Uske Uprant Svecha Kaya Se Age Jakar Panch Ashrav Sevan Ka Pachhakkhan Javajjivaye Duviham, Tivihenam, Na Karemi, Na Karvemi, Mannsa, Vaysa, Kaysa Evam Chatthe Dishivrat Ke Panch Aiyara Janiyavva Na Samayariyavva Tamjaha Te Aloum-Uddhadisippamanaikkame, Ahodisippamanaikkame, Tiriyadisippamanaikkame, khittvuddhi, Saiantaraddha, Jo Me Devasio Aiyaro Kao Tass Michhami Dukkadam.

Pachhakkayamane Ullaniyavihi, Dantanvihi, Phalvihi, Abbhanganvihi, Uvattanvihi, Majjanvihi, Vatthavihi, Vilevanvihi, Puffavihi, Abharanvihi, Dhuvanvihi, Dhuvavihi, Pejjavihi, Bhakkhanvihi, Odanvihi, Supavihi, Vigayvihi, Sagvihi, Mahurvihi, Jimanvihi, Paniyavihi, Mukhvasvihi, Vahanavihi, Uvanahvihi, Sayanvihi, Sachittavihi, Davvavihi, In 26 Bolon Ka Yatha Pariman Kiya He Iske Uprant Upbhog-Paribhog Vastu Ko Bhog Nimitta Se Bhogne Ka Pachhakkhan Javjjivaye Egviham, Tivihenam, Na Karemi, Mansa, Vaysa, Kaysa Evam Satva Vrat Upbhog-Paribhog Duvihe Pannatte Tamjaha Bhoyanao Ya Kammao Ya Bhoyanao Samnovasayanam Panch Aiyaro Janiyavva Na Samayariyavva Tamjaha Te Aloum-Sachittahare, Sachttapadibaddhahare, Appu-uli Osahibhakkhanya, Duppa-uli Osahibhkkhanya, Tuchhosahibhakkhanya, Kamm-o Ya Nam Samanovasyenam Pannarass Kammadanaim Janiyavvaim Na Samayariyavvaim Tamjaha Te Aloum-Ingalkamme, Vankamme, Sadikamme, Bhadikamme, Phodikamme, Dantvanijje, Lakhavanijje, Rasvanijje, Kesvanijje, Visvanijje, Jantpilankamme, Nillanchankamme, Davaggidavnaya, Sar-dah-talay-sosanaya, Asaijan Posanaya, Jo Me Devasio Aiyaro Kao Tass Michhami Dukkadam.

Chauvvihe Anatthadande Pannatte Tamjaha-Avajjhanachariye, Pamayachariye, Hinsappayane, Pavkammovayese, Evam Athava Anatthadand Sevan Ka Pachhakkhan Jisme Ath Agar Aye Va, Raye Va, Naye Va, Parivare Va, Deve Va, Nage Va, Jakkhe Va, Bhuye Va, Ettiehim Agarehim Annattha Javajjivaye Duviham, Tivihenam, Na Karemi, Na Karvemi, Mansa, Vaysa, Kaysa, Evam Athava Anatthadand Virman Vrat Ke Panch Aiyara Janiyavva Na Samayariyavva Tamjaha Te Aloum-Kandappe, Kukkuie, Moharie, Sanjuttahigarane, Uvabhog Paribhogairitte, Jo Me Devasio Aiyaro Kao Tass Michhami Dukkadam.

Savajjam Jogam Pachhakkhami Javniyamam Pajjuvasami Duviham, Tivihenam, Na Karemi, Na Karvemi, Mansa, Vaysa, Kaysa, Eisi Meri Saddahana Prarupna To Hai, Samayik Ka Avsar Aye, Samayik Karu Tab Pharasna Karke Shuddh Hou Evam Navme Samayik Vrat Ke Panch Aiyara Janiyavva Na Samayariyavva Tamjaha Te Aloum-Manduppanihane, Vayduppanihane, Kayduppanihane, Samaiyassa Sai Akarnaya, Samaiyassa Anavatthiyassa Karanaya, Jo Me Devasio Aiyaro Kao Tass Michhami Dukkadam.

Din Prati Prabhat Se Prarambh Karke Purvadik Chaho Dishao Me Jitni Bhoomika Ki Maryada Rakhi Ho, Uske Uprant Svechha Kaya Se Age Jakar Panch Ashrav Sevan Ka Pachhakkhan Jav Ahorattam Duviham, Tivihenam, Na Karemi, Na Karvemi, Mansa, Vaysa, Kaysa Tatha Jitni Bhoomika Ki Hadd Rakhi Hai, Usme Jo Dravyadik Ki Maryada Ki Hai Uske Uprant Upbhog Paribhog Vastu Ko Bhog Nimitt Se Bhogne Ka Pachhakkhan Jav Ahorattam Egviham, Tivihenam, Na Karemi, Mansa, Vaysa, Kaysa Evam Dasve Desavagasik Vrat Ke Panch Aiyara Janiyavva Na Samayariyavva Tamjaha Te Aloum-Anvanappaoge, Pesavanappaoge, Saddanuvae, Ruvanuvae, Bahiyapuggal Pakkheve, Jo Me Devasio Aiyaro Kao Tass Michhami Dukkadam.

Asanam, Panam, Khaimam, Saimam Ka Pachhakkhan, Abambh Sevan Ka Pachhakkhan, Amuk Mani-Suvarna Ka Pachchakkhan, Mala Vannaga-Vilevan Ka Pachhakkhan, Satthamusladik Savajja Jog Sevan Ka Pachhakkhan, Jav Ahorattam Pajjuvasami Duviham, Tivihenam, Na Karemi, Na Karvemi, Mansa, Vaysa, Kaysa Aisi Meri Saddahana Prarupana To Hai, Poushadh Ka Avsar Aye Poushadh Karu, Tab Pharasna Karke Shuddh Hou Evam Gyarahva Pratipurna Paushadh Vrat Ke Panch Aiyara Janiyavva Na Samayariyavva Tamjaha Te Aloum-Appadilehiy Duppadilehiy Sejjasantharae, Appamajjiy Duppamajjiy Sejjasantharae, Appadilehiy Duppadilehiy Uchhar Pasvanbhoomi, Appamajjiy Duppamajjiy Uchhar Pasvanbhoomi, Posahassa Sammam Ananupalanaya, Jo Me Devasio Aiyaro Kao Tass Michhami Dukkadam.

Samne Nigganthe Phasuy Esanijjenam Asanam, Panam, Khaimam, Saimam, Vatha, Padiggaha, Kambal, Paypunchhanenam, Padihariy Peedh, Phalag, Sejja, Santharenam, Osah, Bhesajjenam, Padilabhemane Vihrami, Aisi Meri Saddahana Prarupana To Hai, Sadhu Sadhviyo Ka Yog Milne Par Nirdosh Dan Du, Tab Pharasna Karke Shudhh Hou, Evam Barahve Atithi Samvibhag Vrat Ke Panch Aiyara Janiyavva Na Samayariyavva Tamjaha Te Aloum-Sachitta Nikkhevanya, Sachitta Pihanya, Kalaikkame, Parovaese, Machhariyae, Jo Me Devasio Aiyaro Tass Michhami Dukkadam.

Aho Bhante! Apachhim Marnantia Samlehana, Jhusana Arahana Poushadhshala Punj, Punjkar, Uchhar Pasvan Bhumi Padileh, Padileh Kar Gamna-Gamne Padikkam, Padikkam Kar Darbhadik Santhara Santhar-Santhar Kar, Darbhadik Santhara Duruh-Duruhakar, Purva Tatha Uttar Disha Sammukh Palyankadik Asan Se Baith, Baithkar Karyal Sampariggahiyam Sirsavattam Mathae Anjali Kattu Evam Vayasi “Namotthunam Arihantanam Bhawantanam Jav Sampattanam” Aise Anant Siddh Bhagwan Ko Namaskar Karke “Namotthunam, Arihantanam Bhagwantanam Jav Sampaviu Kamanam”Jayvante Vartaman Kale Mahavideh Kshetra Me Vicharte Hue Tirthankar Bhagwan Ko Namaskar Karke Apne Dharmacharyaji Ko Namaskar Karta Hu. Sadhu Pramukh Charo Tirth Ko Khama Ke, Sarva Jeev Rashi Ko Khama Karke, Pehle Jo Vrat Adre Hai, Unme Jo Atichar Dosh Lage Hai, Ve Sarva Aloch Ke, Padikkam Ke, Nind Ke, Nishalya Ho Karke Savvam Panaivayam Pachhakkhami, Savvam Musavayam Pachhakkhami, Savvam Adinnadanam Pachhakkhami, Savvam Mehunam Pachhakkhami, Savvam Pariggaham Pachhakkhami, Savvam Koham Manam Jav Michhadamsanasallam Savvam Akarnijjam Jogam Pachhakkhami, Javajjivae Tiviham Tivihenam Na Karemi, Na Karvemi, Karantam Pi Annam Na Samanujanami, Mansa, Vaysa, Kaysa Aise Atharah Papsthan Pachhakkh Ke Savvam Asnam, Panam, Khaimam, Saimam, Chauvvihampi Aharam Pachhakkhami, Javajjivae Aise Charo Ahar Pachhakkh Ke Jam Piyam Imam Sariram Ittham, Kantam, Piyam, Manunnam, Manamam, Dhijjam, Visasiyam, Sammayam, Anumayam, Bahumayam, Bhandakarandag Samanam, Rayankarandag Bhuyam, Ma Nam Siyam, Ma Nam Unham, Ma Nam Khuha, Ma Nam Pivasa, Ma Nam Vala, Ma Nam Chora, Ma Nam Damsamasaga, Ma Nam Vaiyam, Pittiyam, Kaffiyam, Sambhimam, Sannivaiyam, Viviha Rogayanka, Parisaha Uvasagga, Phasa Phusantu Evam Piyanam Charimehim Ussasa Nissasehim Vosirami. Ti Kattu Aise Sharir s Vosira Ke, Kalam Anavakankh Mane Vihrami, Aisi Meri Saddahana Prarupana To Hai, Farasna Karu Tab Shuddh Hou, Aise Apachhim Marnantiy Samlehana Jusana Arahanae Panch Aiyara Janiyavva Na Samayariyavva Tamjaha Te Aloum - Ihalogasansappaoge Parlogasansappaoge Jeeviyasansappaoge Marnasansappaoge Kambhogasansappaoge Jo Me Devasio Aiyara Kao Tass Michhami Dukkadam.

Yo Samkit purvak 12 Vrat , Salekhanaa sahit, esame jo koi Aatikram, Vyatikram, Atichaar, Anaachar janate Ajante, man-vachan-kaya se sevan kiya ho, karavaya ho, Anumodan kiya ho to Anant siddh kevalgyaani kee Aatma kee Sakshi se Tassa Michchhaami Dukkadam.

Chaudah Sthaan samoorchchhim jeev aaloum - 1. Uchchaaresu vaa, 2. paasavanesu vaa, 3. khelesu vaa, 4. sanghaanesu vaa, 5. vantesu vaa, 6. pittesu vaa, 7. soniesu vaa, 8. pooesu vaa, 9. sukkesu vaa, 10. sukka puggal parisaadesu vaa, 11. vigay jeev parisaadesu vaa, 12. itthee puris kalevaresu vaa, 13. nagar niddhamanesu vaa, 14. savvesu chev asueethhaanesu vaa in choudaha prakaar ke samoorchchhim manushyo kee viraadhana kee ho to tassa michchhaami Dukkadam.

1)Abhigrahik Mithyaatva
2)Anaabhigrahik Mithyaatva
3)Abhiniveshik Mithyaatva
4)Saansayik Mithyaatva
5)Anaabhog Mithyaatva 
6)Loukik Mithyaatva 
7)Lokottar
8)Krupraavachanik
9)Jinmaarg se nyoon kahe to Mithyaatva 
10) Jinmaarg se adhik kahe to Mithyaatva
11) Jinmarg se vipareet kahe to Mithyaatva
12)Jeev ko Ajeev kahe to Mithyaatva 
13)Ajeev ko Jeev kahe to Mithyaatva
14)Dharma ko Adharma Shraddhe to Mithyaatva
15)Adharma ko Dharma Shraddhe to Mithyaatva
16)Saadhu ko Asaadhu shraddhe to Mithyaatva
17)Asaadhu ko Saadhu Shraddhe to Mithyaatva
18)Mokshmaarg ko Sansaar kaa maarg shraddhe to Mithyaatva
19)Sansaar ke maarg ko Mokshs ka maarg Shraddhe to Mithyaatva
20)Moksh gaye ko moksh naahi gaye Shraddhe to Mithyaatva
21)Moksh naahi gaye ko Moksh gaye Shraddhe to Mithyaatva
22)Avinay Mithyaatva 
23)Aasaatanaa Mithyaatva
24)Agnaan Mithyaatva
25)Akriyaa Mithyaatva, 
in 25 prakaar ke Mithyaatva me se kisee Mithyaatva ka seven kiyaa ho, seven karaayaa ho, seven karanevaale ko Anumodan kiya ho to Tassa Michchhami Dukkadam.
Shree Mahaveer Swami, Simandhar Swami, Guruguruniji m. s. aapase ‘ Shraman Sootra’ karne ki aadnyaa leta / leta hu.

Chattaari magalam, Arihantaa magalam, Siddhaa magalam, Saahoo magalam Kevalipannatto Dhammo mangalam, Chattaari loguttamaa, Arihantaa loguttamaa, saahoo loguttamaa, Kevali pannatto Dhammo Loguttamaa, Chattaari Saranam Pavajjaami, Arihante Saranam Pavajjaami Siddhe Saranam Pavajjami, Saahu Saranam Pavajjami, Kevali pannattam dhammam Saranam Pavajjami, Arihanto Ka Sharana, Siddho Ka Sharana, Saadhuvo ka Sharana, Kevaliparupeet Daya Dharm Ka Sharana, Chaar Sharana, Durgati Harana aur Sharana Nahi Koy, Jo Bhavi Praani Aadare To Ajar Amar Pad Hoy.
 Angusthe Amrut Vase,
 Labddhi Tana Bhandar |
 Shreeguru Gautam Sumariye,
 Manvancchit Phaldattar |
 Bhave Bhavana Bhaviye,
 Bhave Dije Daan |
 Bhave Dharm Aaradhiye
 Paave Kevalgyaan |
 Paave Pad Nirvaan ||

Icchami Paddikkmium Pagaamsijaye, Nigaamsijaye Santhara Uvatthanaye, Pariytthanaye, aautthanaye, Pasaarnaye, Chappai Sanghattanaye Kuiye, Kakkaraiye, Chiye, Jambhaiye, Oomose Sasrakhamose, Aaulmaulaye, Suvanvattiyaye, Ithivipariyasiyaye(Purisviparisiyae – Striyo ke liye ), Ditthivipariyasiyaye, Manvipariyasiyaye, Pan-Bhoyan-vipariyasiyaye, jo me Devasio Aiyaro Kao Tass Michhami Dukkadam.

Paddhikkmami Goyarggachariyaye, Bhikkhariyaye , Ugghadkavad Ugghadnaye, Saana-Vaccha-Darayaa-Sanghtanaye, Mandipahudiyaye, Balipahudiyaye, Thavana-Paahudiyaye, Sankiye, Sahassagare, Aanesnaye, Panesnaye, Annabhoanaye, Panbhoanaye, Biybhoanaye, Hariybhoanaye, Pacchakammiyaye, Purekammiyaye, Adithhadaye, Dagsansathhadaye, Raysansathhada, Parisadniyaye, Parithavaniyaye, Oohasnabhikkkhaye, Jam Uggamenam, Uppaynesnaaye, Apadisuddham, Paddiggahiyam Paribbhuttam Vaa Jam n Paritthaviyam, Tass Michhami Dukkadam.

Padikkammami Chaukalam Sajzayassa Akarnayaye Ubhoo Kalam Bhandovagrnssa Appadilehnnaye, Duppadilehnnaye, Appamajjanaye, Duppamajjanaye, Aaikkamane, Vaikkamane, Aiyare, Anayare, jo me Devasio Aiyaro- Kao Tass Michhami Dukkadam.

Padikkamami egvihe Asanjame. Padikkamami dohim Bandhanehim – Rag bandhnenam , Dos bandhnenam. Padikkamami tihim Dandehim – Man dandenam, Vay dandenam, Kaaya dandenam. Padikkamami tihim Guttihim – Man guttiye, Vay guttiye, kaay guttiye. Padikkamami tihim sallehim – Maya sallenam, Niyan sallenam, michhadansan sallenam, Padikkamami tihim Gaarvehim - Iddhi gaarvenam, Ras gaarvenam, Saaya gaarvenam. Padikkamami tihim Virahanaahim – Naan virahanaae, Dansan virahanaae, Charitt virahanaae. Padikkamami Chauhim kasaaehim – Koh kasaaenam, Maan kasaaenam, Maaya kasaaenam, Loh kasaaenam. Padikkamami Chauhim Sannahim – Ahaar sannae, Bhay sannae, Mehun sannae, Pariggah sannae. Padikkamami Chauhim Vikahaahim – Itthi Kahaae(Puris Kahaae), Bhatt kahaae, Des Kahaae, Raay Kahaae. Padikkamami Chauhim Zanehim – Attenam zaanenam , Ruddenam zaanenam, Dhammenam zaanenam, Sukkenam zaanenam. Padikkamami Panchahim kiriyaahim – Kaaiyaae, Ahigarniyaae, Paausiyae, Parittavniyaae, Paanaivayaae. Padikkamami Panchahim Kaam Gunehim Saddenam, Ruvenam, Gandhenam, Rasenam, Faasenam, Padikkamami Panchahim Mahavvaehim – Savvaao - Panaaivayao - Vermanam, Savvaao Musaavayao Vermanam, Savvao Aadinnadanao Vermanam, Savvao Mehunao Vermanam, Savvao Pariggahao Vermanam. Padikkamami Panchahim Samaihim – Iriyaa samiiye, Bhaasha samiiye, Esnaa samiiye, Ayaanbhand - mattnikkhevana samiiye, Uccharpasvaan - khel jalsandhaan - paritthavniyaa samiiye. Padikkamami Chhahim Jivnikaaehim – Pudhvikaaenam, Aau kaaenam, Teu kaaenam, Vau kaaenam, Vanassai kaaenam, tas kaaenam. Padikkamami Chhahim Lesaahim – Kinha lesaae, Neel lesaae, Kau lessae, Teu lessae, Paum lessae, Sukk lesaae. Padikkamami Sattahim Bhaythhanehim – Ihloga bhaenam, Parloga bhaenam, Aadaan bhaenam, Akamha bhaenam, Aajeevika bhaenam, Maran Bhaenam, Silaagha bhaenam. Padikkamami Attahim Maytthaanehim – Jaaimaenam, Kulmaenam, Balmaenam, Ruvmaenam, Tavmaenam, Laab hmaenam, Sooymaenam, Issriyaamaenam. Padikkamami Navhim Bambhcher guttihim. Padikkamami Dashim Samandhammehim. Ekkarashim Uvaasag padimahim. Baarashim Bhikkhu Padimaahim. Terasahim Kiriyaa Thhanehim, Chaudasahim Bhuyagaamehim, Pannarasahim Parmahammi ehim, Solasahim Gahaa Solasehim. Sattarasvihe Asanjamehim, Attarasvihe Abambhehim, Egunvissae Naayazay nehim, Visaae Asamaahi thhanehim, Egvisaae Sablehim, Baavisaae Parisehim, Tevisaae Suyagadjzaynehim, Chauvisaae Devehim, Panvisaae Bhaavnahim, Chhavvisaae Dasaa kappa - vavharenam Uddesankalenam, Sattavisaae Anagaar - Gunehim, Athh - thha - visaae Aayarapp - kappehim, Eguntisaae Paavsuyapp - sangehim, Tisaae Mahaamohniya Thaanehim, Egtisaae Siddhaae Gunehim, Battisaae Jogsang - he - him, Tettisaae Aasaanaae, Arihantanam Aasaanaae, Siddhaanam Aasaanaae, Aayariyaanam Aasaanaae, Uvajzaayanam Aasaanaae, Saahunam Aasaanaae, Saahuninam Aasaanaae, Saavyaanam Aasaanaae, Saaviyaanam Aasaanaae, Devanam Aasaanaae, Devinam Aasaanaae, Iha Logassa Aasaanaae, Para-logassa Aasaanaae, Kevalinam Aasaanaae, Kevali Pannatassa Dhamassa Aasaanaae, Sadevmanuyaa - surassa - Logassa Aasaanaae, Savva- Paan- Bhooya- jeev- Sattanam Aasaanaae, Kalassa Aasaanaae, Suyassa Aasaanaae, Suydevyaae Aasaanaae, Vaaynayriyassa Aasaanaae, Jam Vaiddham, Vachhameliyam, Heenakkharam, Achhakkharam, Payheenam, Vinayheenam, Jogheenam, Ghosaheenam, Sutthudinnam, Dutthupadichhiyam, Akale Kao Sajjhao, Kale Na Kao Sajjhao, Asajjhaye Sajjhaiyam, Sajjhaye Na Sajjhaiyam, Eesinam Egaaiye Tettisaae Thhananam Mazje je Jaaniyvvaaim te no naaya, Je Vippajhiy - vvaim – Teno - Vippajhiyaa, Je Samayriyvvaim Teno Samayriya Tassa Michhaami Dukdam.

Namo Chauvvisaye Titthayranam Usabhai-Mahaveer Pajjvsananam, Inamev Niggantham Pavyanam, Saccham, Anuttaram, Kevaliyam, Paddipunnam, Neyauyam, Sansuddham, Sallakattanam, Siddhimaggam, Muttimaggam, Nijjanmagganam, Nivvanmaggam, Avithahmvisandhi, Savvadukhppahinmaggam, ittham Thiya Jiva, Sijzanti, Bujzanti, Mucchanti, Parinivvayanti, savvadukhhanmantam Karanti, tam Dhammam Saddahami Patiyami, Royemi, Phasemi, Palemi, Anupalemi, Tam Dhammam Saddahanto, Pattiyanto, Royanto, Phasanto, Palanto, Anupalanto, Tassa Dhammass, Kevalipannassa, Abhhutthioomi 

Aarahnaye, Veeroomi Virahnaye, Asanjamam Pariyanami, Sanjamam Uvasampajjaammi, Abambham Pariyanami, Bambham Uvasanpajjaammi, Akappam Pariyanami, Kappam Uvasampajjaammi, Annanam Pariyanami, Nanam Uvasanpajjaammi, Akiriyam Pariyanami, Kiriyam Uvasanpajjaammi, Micchattam Pariyanami, Sammattam Uvasanpajjaammi, Abohim Pariyanami, Bohim Uvasanpajjaammi, Umaggam Pariyanami, Maggam Uvasanpajjaammi, jam Sambhrami, jam ch n Samnhrami, jam Padikkamami, jam ch n Padikkamami, Tass Savvass Devasiyass Aaiyarass Padikkamami Samnoham Sanjay-viray- Padihay- Pratikraman Pacchkkhaypavkamme,s Aniyano Ditthisampanno Mayamosam-Vivajjaoo, Addhaijjesu Divsamuddesu, Pannaras-Kammabhumisu Javanti Kei Saahu, Rayharan-Gucchag- Padiggahadhara, Panch Mahvvaydhara, Attharassahassa Silangarhadhra, Akkhay-aayar- Charritta, te Savve Sirasa, Manasa, matthein Vandami ||
Shree Mahaveer Swami, Simandhar Swami, Guruguruniji m.s. aapase Panch Padon ki Bhavvandana karne ki aadnyaa leta / leti hu.

 Sat Sat Nav Akshara, Pap Sakal kshay Jay|

 Pahile pad Arihant Bhagwan Jaghanya Bees Tirthankarji, Utkrushta Ek Sau Sath Tatha Ek Sau Sittar Devadhidevji Unme Vartaman Kal Me Bees Viharmanji Mahavideh Kshetra Me Vicharte Hai. Ek Hajar Ath Lakshan Ke Dharanhar Chautis Atishay, Paintis Vani Karke Virajman, Chausath Indro Ke Vandaniy, Pujaniy, Atharah Dosh Rahit, Barah Gun Sahit, Anant Gyan, Anant Darshan, Anant Charitra, Anant Bal Virya, Anant Sukh, Divya-Dhwani, Bhamandal, Sphatik-Sinhasan, Ashok-Vruksh, Kusum-Vrushti, Dev Dundubhi, Chatra Dharave, Chamvar Bijave, Purushakar Parakram Ke Dharanhar, Aise Adhai Dveep Pandraha Kshetra Me Vicharte Hai, Jaghanya Do Karod Kevali, Utkrushta Nav Karod Kevali, Kevalgyan, Kevaldarshan, Ke Dharanhar Sarva Dravya-Kshetra-Kal-Bhav Ke Jananhar.

 Namo Shri Arihant, Karmo Ka Kiya Ant,

 Hua So Kevalvant Karuna Bhandari Hai |

 Atishay Chautis Dhar, Paintis Vani Uchhar,

 Samjhave Nar-Nar, Par Upkari Hai |

 Sharir Sundarkar, Suraj So Jhalkar,

 Gun Hai Anant Sar, Dosh Parihari Hai |

 Kahat Hai Tilok Rikh, Man Vach Kayakari,

 Luli Luli Barambar, Vandana Hamari Hai |

 Aise Shri Arihant Bhagwan Din Dayal Maharaj Apki Diwas Sambandhi Avinay Ashatana Ki Ho To, He Arihant Bhagwan! Mera Apradh Kshma Kariye! Hath Jod, Man Mod, Shish Namakar, Tikkutto Ke Path Se Ek Hazar Ath Bar Vandana Namaskar Karta Hu. (Recite Full Tikkhutto Path Here) Ap Mangalik Ho, Ap Uttam Ho, He Swami!He Nath!Apka Is Bhav, Parbhav, Bhav-Bhav Me Sadakal Sharan Ho.

Duje Pad Shri Siddh Bhagwan Maharaj-Choudh Prakare, Pandrah Bhede Anant Siddh Hue Hai, Ath Karma Khapakar Moksh Pahunche Hai, Tirth Siddha, Atirth Siddh, Tirthankar Siddha, Atirthankar Siddha, Svayambuddha Siddha, Pratyekbuddha Siddha, Buddha Bodhit Siddha, Striling Siddha, Purushling Siddha, Napumsakling Siddha, Swaling Siddha, Anyaling Siddha, Grihasthaling Siddha, Ek Siddha, Anek Siddha, Jahan Janam Nahi, Jara Nahi, Maran Nahi, Bhay Nahi, Rog Nahi, Shok Nahi, Dukh Nahi, Daridra Nahi, Karm Nahi, Kaya Nahi, Moh Nahi, Maya Nahi, Chakar Nahi, Thakar Nahi, Bhukh Nahi, Trusha Nahi, Jyot Me Jyot Virajman, Sakal Karya Siddh Karke, Choudah Prakare, Pandrah Bhede Anant Siddh Bhagwan Hue Hai. Anant Sukho mai leen Anant Gyan, Anant Darshan, Anant Sukh, Kshayik Samkit, Nirabadh, Atal Avgahna, Amurt, Agurulaghu, Anantavirya, Ye Ath Gun Karke Sahit Hai.

 Sakal Karam Tal, Vash Kar Liyo Kal,

 Mugati Me Rahya Mal, Atma Ko Tari Hai |

 Dekhat Sakal Bhav, Hua Hai Jagat Rav,

 Sada Hi Kshayik Bhav, Bhaye Avikari Hai |

 Achal Atal Roop, Ave Nahi Bhav Koop,

 Anup Swaroop Up, Aise Siddh Dhari Hai |

 Kahat Hai Tilok Rikh, Batao Ea Vas Prabhu,

 Sada Hi Ugante Soor, Vandana Hamari Hai |

 Aise Shri Siddh Bhagwan Din Dayal Maharaj Apki Diwas Sambandhi Avinay Ashatna Ki Ho To, He Siddh Bhagwan! Mera Apradh Barambar Kshama Kariye! Hath Jod, Man Mod, Shish Namakar, Tikkutto Ke Path Se Ek Hazar Ath Bar Vandana Namaskar Karta Hu. (Recite Full Tikkhutto Path Here)Ap Mangalik Ho, Ap Uttam Ho, He Swami!He Nath! Apka Is Bhav, Parbhav, Bhav-Bhav Me Sadakal Sharan Ho.

Tije Pad Shri Acharyaji Maharaj-Chattis Gun Karke Virajman, Panch Mahavrat Pale, Panch Achar Pale, Panch Indriya Jeete, Char Kashay Tale, Nav-Vad Sahit Shuddh Brahmacharya Pale, Panch Samiti, Teen Gupti, Shuddh Aradhe Ye Chattis Gun Karke Sahit Hai. Aath Sampada- 1. Achar Sampada 2. Shrut Sampada 3. Sharir Sampada 4. Vachan Sampada 5. Vachana Sampada 6. Mati Sampada 7. Prayogmati Sampada 8. Sangrah Parigya Sampada Sahit Hai.

 Gun Hai Chattis Pur, Dharat Dharam Ur,

 Marat Karam Krur, Sumati Vichari Hai |

 Shuddh So Acharwant, Sundar Hai Roop Kant,

 Bhaniya Hai Sabhi Siddhant, Vachana Supyari Hai |

 Adhik Madhur Ven, Koi Nahi Lope Ken,

 Sakal Jivo Ka Sen, Kirati Apari Hai |

 Kahat Hai Tilok Rikh, Hitkari Det Seekh,

 Aise Acharajaji Ko, Vandana Hamari Hai |

 Aise shri Acharyaji Maharaj Nyaypakshi, Bhadrik Parinami, Param Pujya Kalpaniy Achitt Vastu Ke Grahanhar, Sachitt Ke Tyagi, Vairagi, Mahaguni, Guno Ke Anuragi, Soubhagi Hai. Aise Shri Acharyaji Maharaj Apki Diwas Sambandhi Avinay Ashatana Ki Ho To, He Acharya Bhagwan! Mera Apradh Barambar Kshama Kariye!Hath Jod, Man Mod, Shish Namakar, Tikkutto Ke Path Se Ek Hazar Ath Bar Vandana Namaskar Karta Hu. (Recite Full Tikkhutto Path Here)Ap Mangalik Ho, Ap Uttam Ho, He Swami! He Nath! pka Is Bhav, Parbhav, Bhav-Bhav Me Sadakal Sharan Ho.

Chauthe Pad Shri Upadhyayji Maharaj-Pachhis Gun Karke Virajman Gyarah Ang, Barah Upang, Charan Sattari, Karan Sattari, Ye Pachhis Gun Karke Sahit Hai, Gyarah Ang Ka Path Arth Sahit Sampurna Jane, Choudah Purva Ke Pathak Aur Nimnokt Battis Sutro Ke Jankar Hai-Gyarah Ang-Acharang, Suyagdang, Thanang, Samvayang, Vivahapannati, Gyata Dharm Katha, Uvasagdasa, Antagadadasa, Anuttarovavai, Prashna-Vyakaran, Vipak-Sootra| Barah Upang-Uvavai, Rayppaseni, Jivabhigam, Pannavana, Jambudiv-Pannatti, Chandapannatti, Soorapannatti, Niryavaliya, Kappavadansiya, Puphiya, Puphachuliya, Vanhidasa |Char Mool Sootra-Uttaradhyayan, Dashvaikalik, Nandisootra, Anuyogdwar Sootra. Char Ched-Dashashrut Skandh, Bruhatkalp, Vyavhar Sootra, Nishith Sootra Aur Battisava Avashyak Sootra Tatha Anek Grantho Ke Jankar, Sat Nay, Char Nikshep, Nischay, Vyavhar, Char Praman Adi Swamat Tatha Anyamat Ke Jankar. Manushya Ya Devta Koyi Bhi Viwad Me Jinko Chalne Me Samarth Nahi, Jin Nahi Pan Jin Sarikhe, Kevali Nahi Pan Kevali Sarikhe Hai.

 Padhat Gyarah Ang, Karmo Su Kare Jang,

 Pakhandi Ko Man Bhang, Karan Hushiyari Hai |

 Chavde Purabdhar, Janat Agam Sar,

 Bhaviyan Ke Sukhakar, Bhramata Nivari Hai |

 Padhave Bhavik Jan, Sthir Kar Det Man,

 Tap Kari Tave Tan, Mamta Ko Mari Hai |

 Kahat Hai Tilok Rikh, Gyan-Bhanu Partikh,

 Aise Upadhyayji Ko Vandana Hamari Hai |

 Aise Shri Upadhyayji Maharaj, Mithyatva Roop Andhkar Ke Metanhar, Samkit Roop Udyot Ke Karanhar, Dharm Se Digte Hue Prani Ko Sthir Kare Sarae, Vare, Dhare, Ityadi Anek Gun Karke Sahit Hai. Aise Shri Upadhyayji Maharaj Apki Diwas Sambandhi Avinay Ashatana Ki Ho To, He Upadhyayji Maharaj! Mera Apradh Barambar Kshama Kariye!Hath Jod, Man Mod, Shish Namakar, Tikkutto Ke Path Se Ek Hazar Ath Bar Vandana Namaskar Karta Hu. (Recite Full Tikkhutto Path Here)Ap Mangalik Ho, Ap Uttam Ho, He Swami! He Nath! Apka Is Bhav, Parbhav, Bhav-Bhav Me Sadakal Sharan Ho.

Panchave Pad Namo Loe Savva Sahunam Adhai Dvip Pandrah Kshetra Roop Lok Me Sarva Sadhuji Maharaj Jaghanya Do Hajar Karod, Utkrusht Nav Hajar Karod Jaywanta Vichare. Panch Mahavrat Pale, Panch Indriy Jeete, Char Kashay Tale, Bhav Sachhe, Karan-Sachhe, Jog-Sachhe, Kshamavant, Vairagyawant, Man Samadharanya, Vay Samadharanya, Kay Samadharanya, Nan Sampanna, Dansan Sampanna, Charitra Sampanna, Vedneey-Sama-Ahiyasanya, Marnantiy-Sama-Ahiyasanya, Aise Sattais Gun Karke Sahit Hai. Panch Achar Pale, Cha-Kay Ki Raksha Kare, Sat Kuvyasan Chhode, Ath Mad Chhode, Navwad Sahit Shudh Brahmacharya Pale, Das Prakare Yati Dharm Dhare, Barah Bhede Tapasya Kare, Satrah Bhede Sanyam Pale, Atharah Papo Ko Tyage, Bais Parishah Jeete, Tees Mahamohaniy Karm Nivare, Taittis Ashatna Tale, Bayalees Dosh Tal Ke Ahar Pani Leve, Saitalis Dosh Tal Ke Bhoge, Bawan Anachar Tale, Tediya Ave Nahi, Netiya Jeeme Nahi, Sachitt Ke Tyagi, Achitt Ke Bhogi, Loch Kare, Nange Pair Chale, Ityadi Kay Klesh Kare Aur Moh Mamta Rahit Hai.

 Aadri Sanyam Bhar, Karni Kare Apar,

 Samiti Gupti Dhar Vikatha Nivari Hai |

 Jayana Kare Chah Kay, Savadhya Na Bole Vay,

 Bujhai Kashay Lay, Kiriya Bhandari Hai |

 Gyan Bhane Atho Yam, Leve Bhagwant Nam,

 Dharam Ko Kare Kam, Mamta Ko Mari Hai |

 Kahat Hai Tilok Rikh, Karmo Ko Tale Vikh,

 Aise Muniraj Ko, Vandana Hamari Hai |

 Aise Muniraj Maharaj Apki Diwas Sambandhi Avinay Ashatana Ki Ho To, He Muniraj Maharaj! Mera Apradh Barambar Kshama Kariye! Hath Jod, Man Mod, Shish Namakar, Tikkutto Ke Path Se Ek Hazar Ath Bar Vandana Namaskar Karta Hu. (Recite Full Tikkhutto Path Here)Ap Mangalik Ho, Ap Uttam Ho, He Swami!He Nath!Apka Is Bhav, Parbhav, Bhav-Bhav Me Sadakal Sharan Ho.

Namo Mam Dhammayriyanam Arthath Mere Dharmacharyji Shri (Yah Apne Guru Maharaj Ka Nam Lena) Ko Vandana Namskar Ho Guruji Maharaj Sadhuji Ke Gun Sahit, Dharmopadeshak Ke Datar Samyaktva Rup Ratna Ke Datar Sansar Samudra se Tarnewale, Adnyan Andhakar Ko Mitanewale, Mokshmarga Me Laganewale, Anantaanant Upkari Mahapurush Hai |

 Jaise Kapda Ko Than, Daraji Betat Aan,

 Khand Khand Kare Jan, Det So Sudhari Hai |

 Kasht Ko Jo Sutrdhar, Hem Ko Kase Sunar,

 Mati Ko Jo Kumbhkar, Patra Kare Tyari Hai |

 Dharati Ko Kirsan, Loh Ko Luhar Jan,

 Shilavat Shila Aan, Ghat Ghade Bhari Hai,

 Kahat Hai Tilok Rikh, Sudhare Jo Guru Sikh,

 Guru Upkari Nit, Lije Balihari Hai |

 Guru Mitra Guru Mat, Guru Saga Guru Tat,

 Guru bhup Guru Bhrat, Guru Hitkari Hai |

 Guru Ravi Guru Chandra, Guru Dev Guru Indra,

 Guru Det Hai Anand, Guru Pad Bhari Hai |

 Guru Det Nyan Dyan, Guru Det Dan Man,

 Guru Det Moksha Sthan, Sada Upkari Hai |

 Kahat Hai Tilok Rikh, Bhali Bhali Dini Sikh,

 Pal Pal Guruji Ko, Vandana Hamari Hai |

 Gurudev Maharaj! Apki Diwas Sambhandi Avinay Ashatana Ki Ho To Maf Kijiye. Hath Jod, Man Mod, Shish Namakar Ek Hazar Ath Bar Vandan Namskar Karta Hu. (Recite Full Tikkhutto Path Here) Guruji Gurunisa Maharaj Apka Is Bhav, Parbhav, Bhav-Bhav Me Sadakal Sharan Ho

Anant Chaubisi Jin Namu Siddh Ananta Karod,

 Kevalgyani Ganadhara Vandu Be Kar Jod |

 Doy Karod Kewal Dhara Viharman Jin Bees,

 Sahastra Yugal Kodi Namu Sadhu Namu Nish Dees |

 Dhan Sadhu Dhan Sadhavi Dhan Dhan Hai Jin Dharma,

 Ye Samarya Patak Zare Tute Atho Karm |

 Anguthe Amrit Base Labdhi Tana Bhandar,

 Shri Guru Gautam Samariye Man Vanchit Phal Datar |

 Guru Dipak Guru Chandano, Guru Bin Ghor Andhar,

 Palak N Visaru Tum Bhani Guru Muze Pran Adhar |

 Sukh Deva Dukh Metava Yahi Tumhari Van,

 Moy Dasni Vinati Sunjo Krupanidhan |

 Jay Jay Shri Parmeshithine Jay Jay Shri Jin Ven,

 Jay Jay Shri Guru Ki Raho Diya Sumarag Jain |

Ayariya Uvajjhaye Sise Sahmmiye Kul-Gane Ya,

 Je Me Keyi Kasaya Savve Tivihena Khamemi |

 Savvass Saman-Sanghass Bhagwao Anjali Karia Sise,

 Savvam Khamavaitta Khamami Savvass Ahayam Pi |

 Savvass Jeevrasissa Bhavao Dhamma-Nihiy Niyachitto,

 Savvam Khamavaitta Khamami Savvassa Ahayam Pi |

 Khamemi Savve Jeeva, Savve Jeeva Khamantu Me,

 Mitti Me Savva Bhooesu, Veram Majzam Na Kenai |

 Evamahm Aloiyam, Nindiyam Garhiyam Duguchhiyam Sammam,

 Tivihenam Padikkanto, Vandami Ji Chuvvisam |

Aise Adhai Dweep Pandrah Kshetra Me Tatha Bahar Shravak Shravika Dan Deve, Sheel Pale, Tapasya Kare, Shuddh Bhavna Bhave Savvar Kare, Samayik Kare, Poushadh Kare, Pratikraman Kare, Teen Manorath Chintve, Choudah Niyam Chitare Jeevadi Nav Padharth Jane Aise Shravak Ke Ekkees Gun Karke Yukta, Anaath, Apang ki daya karnewale, Ek Vrat Dhari Jav Barah Vrat Dhari Bhagwant Ki Agnya Me Vichare, Aise Bado Se Hath Jod Pair Padkar Kshama Mangta Hu. Ap Kshama Kare Ap Kshama Karne Yogya Hai, Aur Chotonse Sammuchchay Khamata Hu.

Sat Lakh Pruthvikay, Sat Lakh Apkay, Sat Lakh Teukay, Sat Lakh Vayukay, Das Lakh Pratyek Vanaspatikay, Choudah Lakh Sadharan Vanaspati Kay, Do Lakh Beindriy, Do Lakh Teindriy, Do Lakh Chaurindriy, Char Lakh Devta, Char Lakh Narki, Char Lakh Tiryanch Panchendriy, Chaudah Lakh Manushya. Aise Char Gati, Chaubis Dandak, Chaurasi Lakh Jivyoni Me Sukshma Badar Paryapta-Aparyapta Jeevo Me Se Kisi Jeev Ka Halte, Chalte, Uthte, Baithe, sote, jaagte, Jaante - Ajaante kisi jeev ka Hanan kiya Ho, Hanan Karaya Ho, Hanta Prati Anumodan Kiya Ho, Cheda Ho, Bheda Ho, Kilamana Upajai Ho, To Man, Vachan, Kaya, Karke(18, 24, 120) Atharah Lakh Chaubis Hajar Eksou Bees Prakare Diwas Sambandhi Tass Michhami Dukkadam.

Pruthvikay ke Barah Lakh Kodikul, Apkay Ke Sat Lakh Kodikul, Teukay Teen Lakh Kodikul, Vayukay Ke Sat Lakh Kodikul, Vanaspati Kay Ke Atthais Lakh Kodikul, Dwidriy Ke Sat Lakh Kodikul, Trindriy Ke Ath Lakh Kodikul, Chaturindriy Ke Nau Lakh Kodikul, Jalchar Ke Sadhe Barah Lakh Kodikul, Sthalchar Ke Das Lakh Kodikul, Khechar Ke Barah Lakh Kodikul, Urpar Ke Das Lakh Kodikul, Bhujpar Ke Nau Lakh Kodikul, Narak Ke Pachhis Lakh Kodikul, Devta Ke Chabis Lakh Kodikul, Manushay Ke Barah Lakh Kodikul Yo Ek Karod Sade satanve Lakh Kodikul Ki Viradhana Ki Ho To Devsi Sambhandi Tass Michhami Dukkadam.

Khamemi Savve Jeeva, Savve Jeeva Khamantu Me,
 Mitti Me Savva Bhooesu, Veram Majzam Na Kenai |
 Evamahm Aloiyam, Nindiyam Garhiyam Duguchhiyam Sammam,
 Tivihenam Padikkanto, Vandami Ji Chuvvisam |

Pahala Samayik, Dusara Chauvisattva, Teesari Vandana, Chautha Pratikraman, ye Chaar Avashyak Purn Huye| Shree Mahaveer Swami, Simandhar Swami evam Guruguruniji m. s. aapase Pachave Aavashyak kee aadnyaa leta / leti hu .
(Rayasi or Devsi Pratikaman - 4 loggassa , Pakkhi Pratikaman - 8 loggassa, Chaumasi Pratikaman - 12 loggassa, Savvatsari Pratikaman - 20 loggassa Ka Kayotsarg karna )

Pahala Samayik, Dusara Chauvisattva, Teesari Vandana, Chautha Pratikraman, Panchva Kaussagga, ye Panch Avashyak Purn Huye| Shree Mahaveer Swami, Simandhar Swami evam Guruguruniji m. s. aapase Chatthe Aavashyak ki aadnya leta / leti hu.

Ganthisahiyam, Mutthisahiyam, Namukkarsahiyam, Porisiyam, Saddha Porisiyam, Apni Apni Ichhanusar Pachhakkhan Tiviham Pi, Chauviham Pi, Aharam, Asnam, Panam, Khaimam, Saimam, Annatthanabhogenam, Sahasagarenam, Mahattaragarenam, Savva-Samahi-Vattiyagarenam Appanam Vosirami.

Pahla Samayik, Dusra Chauvisattva, Teesri Vandana, Chautha Pratikraman, Panchva Kaussagga Aur Chattha Pratyakhyan In Chah Avashyako Me Atikram, Vyatikram, Atichar, Anachar, Jante Ajante Koi Atichar Dosh Laga Ho Tatha Path Uchharan Karte Samay Kana, Matra, Anuswar, Pad, Akshar, Adhik, Nyun, Aage, Piche Kaha Ho To Devsi Sambhandi Tass Michhami Dukkadam.

 Mithyatva Ka Pratikraman, Avrat Ka Pratkraman, Pramad Ka Pratikraman, Kashay Ka Pratikraman, Ashubh Yog Ka Pratikraman, In Panch Prakar Ka Pratikraman Nahi Kiya Ho To Tass Michhami Dukkadam.

 Sham, Samveg, Nirved, Anukampa Aur Astha, Sacche Ki Shradha aur Juthe Ka Barmbar Michhami Dukkadam.

 Bhutkal Ka Pratikraman, Vartaman Kal Ki Samayik Aur Bhavishya Kal Ka Pacchkkhan, Ye Teen Karte Hai, Karvate Hai, Karne Wale Ko Anumodan Dete Hai, Un Pursho Ko Dhanya Hai. Dev Arihant, Guru Nigranth, Keval Bhashit Dayamay Dharma Ye Teen Tatva Sar!Sansar Aasar!Bhagwant Maharaj Apka Marg Sachham! Sachham! Sachham! Thavthui Mangalam.
